1.content:
You'd been looking at this odd app for a number of minutes now. You'd only just been messing around with some inputs on the device, but all of the sudden some new app popped up that hadn't been on there before. You figure you must have entered some secret code to unlock it or something. "Huh... Select Contact... Assume Control? What...?" You mull over the options menu, trying to figure out what this was.

"So if I select a person's contact or picture through this app... I can possess their body? Yeah right..." You chuckle dismissively, but still find yourself interested enough to keep staring at the screen longingly at the idea. "Well... I guess one little test couldn't hurt..." You find the picture of the person you were interested in, tap the button on screen, and end up in the body of...
1.title: The start.

122.content:
You open your eyes to a room not your own. However, it's familiar to you. You've spent many hours in this room hanging out with your friend-

"Hilda?" You say to yourself, covering your mouth once you heard your voice. That was Hilda's voice. That could only mean one thing, "Holy crap! It worked!" You shout to yourself, looking down upon your new form. You spot two large mounds on your chest, covered by a white shirt and black jacket. Your bottom is adorned in blue jean shorts, and they were short alright! Hilda has been a dear friend of yours for years, but that doesn't mean you haven't noticed her sweet butt before. Further down, her long smooth legs were left uncovered for the world to see, and ended in black boots down at your feet.

"I can't believe it! This is really Hilda! I'M HILDA!" You say, marvelling at your current form, a devilish grin running across your face with a laugh, "Which means I can do whatever I want!"

What do you do first?
122.title: Hilda, your tomboy best friend

info.brief_description: You're about to start your Journey, but unlock a strange feature on the Xtransceiver...
info.description:
You are a new trainer starting out in the Unova region, having just obtained your first Pokemon a couple of days ago. After getting a Xtransceiver from your mom, you seemed to accidentally unlock a hidden feature, one that lets you possess other people's bodies!


Characters:

Ian - "Insert A Name," aka you. You're an average guy who's interested in seeing how this new app plays out. You're based visually on the PC from B/W

Professor Juniper - The hot young professor that gave you your first Pokemon and sent you out on your journey.

Bianca - One of your childhood friends. She's ditzy but a cute busty blonde.

Hilda - Another friend of yours, a rowdy tomboy (based on the female PC from B/W)

Rosa - Another trainer your age and friend of Hilda, you can't help but think she's hot (based on the female PC from B2/W2)

Alison - Your stay at home Mother.

Fennel - The eccentric scientist researching Pokemon Dreams.

Gym Leaders and Elite Four - Lenora, Elesa, Skyla, Iris, Roxie, Shauntel, Caitlin

Team Plasma - Two splinter groups of the evil team, one dresses in weird cyan blue uniforms, the other in dark black ones.

The basic rules of this story are as follows;

1. No killing off the Main Character
2. No possessing Pokemon
3. Anything goes sex wise
4. Everyone in this story is at least 18.
5. This story mixes and matches BW and B2W2
